name: Yuxiao Sun
tagline: I am a graduate student at the University of Chicago reading M.A. in social science. My concentrations are computational social science and natural language processing.
body:
**PASSION:** pattern recognition & causal inference

**EXPERIENCE:** data analysis, database management, project management, program evaluation and academic research.

**SKILL:** Python, R for programming (machine learning, data scrapping, natural language processing); STATA for econometric
analysis; Matlab for mathematical modelling; SQL, Hadoop for database management; Tableau, GIS for data visualization.

**LANGUAGE:** English/Fluent; Mandarin Chinese/Fluent; French/Beginner 

Featured Github Projects:
1. [Study on Media Bias](https://github.com/yuxiaosun/hwcfpp/tree/master/project)
2. [Machine Learning Pipeline/Toolkit](https://github.com/yuxiaosun/capp-455136/tree/master/mlpipe)
3. [US Nonprofits Database](https://github.com/yuxiaosun/USngo)
4. [Study on NGO's Mission Statements and Fund Raising Capacity](https://github.com/yuxiaosun/USngo)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
